StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SearchAlerts]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgUnitID int = 0, @FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @AlertTypeID int, @SortColumnNumber int, @ColumnSortOrder bit, @startRowIndex int, @maximumRows int ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED declare @totalrows int
SELECT @totalrows = Count(*) FROM [dbo].[Alert] a INNER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] ou ON ou.PSROrgUnitID = a.OrgUnitID INNER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnitType] outype ON outype.PSROrgUnitTypeID = ou.PSROrgUnitTypeID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON a.OrgUnitID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgHQ ON orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.HQ LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS WHERE ( orgRSS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (a.AlertDateTime >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (a.AlertDateTime <= @ToDate OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND (a.AlertTypeID = @AlertTypeID OR @AlertTypeID = 0 OR @AlertTypeID IS NULL) AND a.IsDeleted = 'False'
SELECT RowNum, @totalrows AS TotalRows, AlertID, Message, AlertTypeID, OrgUnitName, OrgUnitTypeID, AlertDateTime, ReferenceID FROM (SELECT
(CASE WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.Message ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 1 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.Message DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 2AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.AlertTypeID ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 2 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.AlertTypeID DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 3 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ou.Descrip.on ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 3 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY ou.Descrip.on DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 4 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY outype.PSROrgUnitTypeID ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 4 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY outype.PSROrgUnitTypeID DESC))
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 5 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.AlertDateTime ASC) ) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 5 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.AlertDateTime DESC) )
WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 6 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 1 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.ReferenceID ASC)) WHEN @SortColumnNumber = 6 AND @ColumnSortOrder = 0 THEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.ReferenceID DESC))
ELSE (ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY a.Message ASC)) END
) as RowNum, a.AlertID AS AlertID, a.AlertTypeID AS AlertTypeID, a.Message AS Message, ou.Descrip.on AS OrgUnitName, outype.PSROrgUnitTypeID AS OrgUnitTypeID, a.AlertDateTime AS AlertDateTime, a.ReferenceID AS ReferenceID FROM [dbo].[Alert] a INNER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] ou ON ou.PSROrgUnitID = a.OrgUnitID INNER JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnitType]outype ON outype.PSROrgUnitTypeID = ou.PSROrgUnitTypeID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[vwOrgUnitIDs] orgs ON a.OrgUnitID = orgs.root LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgHQ ON orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.HQ LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRegion ON orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.Region LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRS ON orgRs.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RS LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PSROrgUnit] orgRSS ON orgRss.PSROrgUnitID = orgs.RSS WHERE ( orgRSS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRS.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgRegion.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR orgHQ.PSROrgUnitID = @OrgUnitID OR @OrgUnitID = 0) AND (a.AlertDateTime >= @FromDate OR @FromDate IS NULL) AND (a.AlertDateTime <= @ToDate OR @ToDate IS NULL) AND (a.AlertTypeID = @AlertTypeID OR @AlertTypeID = 0 OR @AlertTypeID IS NULL) AND a.IsDeleted = 'False' ) AS Alert WHERE @startRowIndex is null OR (RowNum BETWEEN @startRowIndex AND (@startRowIndex + @maximumRows) - 1)
Order By RowNum
